@clodeineee Hi, I work @MailOnline Can we use your footage & screen grabs in the MailOnline and https://t.co/oyvj3TkiX8 video player, apps and social accounts? We will fully credit back to this video. Please find our terms here: https://t.co/MvsGrpeRLy and reply to confirm.
